ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?
ygData.msgSnippet: The Claw is faster then the Whip.  Also when it comes time to duel wield you will appreciate the light weight of the claw.   The claw have a nice look, IMO,
ygData.messageBody:
The Claw is faster then the Whip. Also when it comes time to duel wield you
will appreciate the light weight of the claw. The claw have a nice look,
IMO, but the whip sounds cooler in combat *CRACK* :) Both are good weapons,
use em both!

Rokenn

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 31, 2000 3:58 AM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] thulian claw hype?
>
>
> The head of my guild just sold me a claw. (Actually,
> I will pay later since I don't have that much...)
>
> Problem is, I see damage of 8-12 using the claw and
> 14-16 using my barbed leather whip. The Whip cost me
> 50 pp, the claws will cost me 200. I don't see the
> point.
>
> Can somebody clear this up for me?
>
> Thanks,
>
> Tyunes of Rodcet Nife
> almost to the 15th Song
>
